channel.title: Beginners Help
channel.description: Hey guys im a beginner and I was wondering where I can learn to create my own server. From my research it seems that I need to find a base server. I found one in the Server Downloads section and it's the Extreme X server. I cant get it running and I did everything I could. I downloaded other servers and got those working but I really like the Extreme X server because of all the working armor, weapons and features. I want to know how to basically create my own server, get it up and running for the public and code items and such. Where can I go to learn this? The guides in Server Tutorials are outdated and it's very confusing. Someone please help me, it would be very appreciated.

item.title: Beginners Help
item.dc:creator: @fatalblitz fatalblitz
item.description:
@fatalblitz wrote:

I would do that but the server i downloaded has everything working. claws ags all specs armors etc all npc monsters god wars and stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginners Help
item.dc:creator: @Z-Codez Z-Codez
item.description:
@Z-Codez wrote:

Ok.
If you cant get it to work. Try useing one of the source’s and clients that do work.
:rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Beginners Help
item.dc:creator: @fatalblitz fatalblitz
item.description:
@fatalblitz wrote:

Hey guys im a beginner and I was wondering where I can learn to create my own server. From my research it seems that I need to find a base server. I found one in the Server Downloads section and it’s the Extreme X server. I cant get it running and I did everything I could. I downloaded other servers and got those working but I really like the Extreme X server because of all the working armor, weapons and features. I want to know how to basically create my own server, get it up and running for the public and code items and such. Where can I go to learn this? The guides in Server Tutorials are outdated and it’s very confusing. Someone please help me, it would be very appreciated.
